citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative: ***On 6 February 2014, at 1:30 PM, the licensee was not available to conduct an animal welfare inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
***On 6 February 2014, at 1:30 PM,  the licensee was not available to conduct an animal welfare inspection.
